subject: FROM THE DESK OF GENERAL MANAG
body:
FROM THE DESK OF GENERAL MANAGER
MONEY GRAM PAYMENT HEADQUARTER

(One Million Eight Hundred Thousand Dollars Only and your email
address was found in the scam victim's list. This Money Gram head
 office has been mandated by
the International Monetary Fund (I.M.F) Director to transfer your

Transfer Daily. The money gram office here
stated that you will be receiving your fund $1,800.000.00 at the
maximum of $5,000.00 daily until

$5,000.00 (Five
Thousand United State Dollars) control numbers have been sent 7888-60** two

Reference Number to you.
kindly call this number +229 55274161 or you write us on Email or

office.
If you prefer to receive your funds in form of an ATM Visa Card, we

if we did not hear from you

Money Gram WILLIAMS ADAM

subject: Re: FROM THE DESK OF GENERAL MANAG
body:
Dear Sir,

I received your email regarding the compensation fund from the Money Gram Head Office. I am surprised to hear that my email was found in the scam victim's list and that I am eligible to receive a sum of One Million Eight Hundred Thousand Dollars.

Before proceeding further, I would like to clarify a few things:

1. Could you please provide more details about this compensation fund? How was it determined that I am one of the victims?

2. You mentioned that I will be receiving my fund daily until the whole amount is completely transferred to me. Could you please explain how this process works?

3. You also mentioned an option of receiving funds in form of an ATM Visa Card. Could you please provide more details about this option?

4. Lastly, could you please confirm if there are any fees or charges associated with receiving this compensation fund?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Maria
